scripts.build:rust-binary: platform_arch=$(node -p 'require("os").platform() + "-" + require("os").arch()') && mkdir -p bin/${platform_arch} && cargo build --release --bin tycode-subprocess --manifest-path ../tycode-subprocess/Cargo.toml --target-dir bin/temp-release && cp bin/temp-release/release/tycode-subprocess bin/${platform_arch}/tycode-subprocess && rm -rf bin/temp-release
